articles.title: Dark Times Ahead for 13 States after Being Barred from Power Exchanges for Failing to Clear Dues

articles.title: Govt reviews windfall gains tax, cuts cess on crude
articles.description: The cess on crude oil was reduced from Rs 17,750 per tonne to Rs 13,000/tonne
articles.content:
In its third fortnightly review of windfall gains tax, the Government of India on August 18 cut the cess on crude oil and reduced it to Rs 13,000/tonne from Rs 17,750 per tonne.
